showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ üöø The shower was very clean with lots of hot water and good water pressure. ‚Ä¶

Everyone was nice and friendly. The young man who was turning over the showers seem to be doing a really good job. He was one of the first I've seen that was spraying and like hard scrubbing / mopping the floor. The only concern is shower ‚Ä¶
Absolutely disgusting showers hope you don't get shower number 6.

Do not use washer 3 I wasted $2.75

Use washer 5 excellent üëå

Dryer 6 gets hot

Friendly staff

Shower 9 was clean ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Very handy if u are camping and need to stock up of fry a shower and grab some ice for the cooler or if say you are going fishing. ‚Ä¶
Nice place good coffee , shower very clean
I used a shower for a restroom only. But it gave me a chance to look around. And this is what I saw. By the way if your wondering my hair is red.
The rest of the place is average, except for typical cold shower problems from pilot/flyingJ. ‚Ä¶
Truck drivers beware. If you want to park here for the night the parking is tight and minimal. Also if you expect a hot shower I wouldn't stop here. The water was warm at best when I took a shower.

‚Ä¶ cleared from the pump so had to keep going. Very inconvenient. Could not get a shower either even though the kiosk took one off my rewards card. Did not give me a slip with code on it. Lady at the counter hand wrote one and that shower ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Ta getting worse and worse. I tried to reserve a shower app blocked me for no reason my co driver tried with his own phone same thing BLOCKED. lady at the counter RUDE a not trying to help anyone and asking 17$ for shower. I hope they teach workers at least how to talk with costumers.

We used to fill up with gas and bring the kids here to eat. It was reasonably priced and buffet was good enough for all of us.
Now, the place is run down, bathroom is repulsive (compared to Kwik trip) and restaurant is closed. C‚Äômon TA. Do something.
This place is a real disaster, it is a lack of respect for all drivers. I have my truck clean inside and unfortunately I have to fill it with grease üò°üò°üò°ü§Æü§Æü§Æ ‚Ä¶

Great TA location. Its got plenty of space, the facility is clean, and the employees are cheerful and freindly. I especially appreciated the showers. Very spacious and impeccably clean - perfect after a long day on the road.

showerReviews.reviewText: First time stopping at a Kwik Trip. Plenty of parks and parks are wide. Staff very friendly and go above beyond. Showers and restrooms are really clean not the size of the major truck stops. Actually seeing someone cleaning and using ‚Ä¶

One of my favorite places to stop as a truck driver...plenty of truck parking, clean affordable showers, and also cheaper laundry facilities. All that plus above average food and good specials. Really hope they start expanding into the ‚Ä¶

Very safe parking lot and store, showers available for $8 with towels/wash cloth provided, clean dining room/microwave available; I was disappointed the bathroom vents were so dusty and that there were no recycling receptacles (kind of a ‚Ä¶
The cleanest truck stop, nice shower for only $8. Polite staff, cheap prices on groceries, lots of parking. Cons - very few such gas stations(

The building is great and super clean. My biggest complaint is they always take advantage of customers on the 88 fuel. Everyone else sells 88 $0.20 to $0.30 cheaper per gallon. Even the other nearby Kwik Trips. But these guys have it $0.03 per gallon less than regular 87 consistently.

Shower Not Good all water on Floor Food Expensive and Late Service Root Staffs 5 Walk Around And Not working

showerReviews.reviewText: First off, as a truck driver, it took 4 hours to get a shower! ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ much better. Staff standing around on their phones while drivers are waiting. Waited 3 hours for a shower and finally asked for a refund, as did 7 other drivers. Not only is the parking lot dirty, so is the inside. There was absolutely ‚Ä¶
rude staff, You have to wait more than an hour for a shower. ‚Ä¶

I can't complain about the food. But the shower issue needs to be addressed. Apparently you can purchase a shower on the app but these guys were letting people in first come first serve. I thought no one was cleaning the showers for a ‚Ä¶

To take a shower here, you have to wait 3 or 4 hours because there are two types of lines: one through the screen, by order, and another where the workers call people as they see fit‚Äîor those who pay them. So there end up being two separate ‚Ä¶

"Three staff members were standing there to assist only two customers, while we waited for someone to clean the shower rooms for almost 2 hours. no options food here.                                              "Here, you can see the dirty ‚Ä¶

Never come here. You wont get a shower. You wont get decent food. You wont get an answer if you call. This is the absolute worst pilot. -5 stars if possible. Ive been otr 3 years and have tried this place now a 3rd time, still horrible. Wou ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ , half the pumps for big trucks are broken. The shower workers reek of weed and while you're showering you'll be serenade by raunchy shit music thumping to a level you can feel 8n the walls. Oh and in the video the shower doesn't shut off ‚Ä¶

I have been here since 1200, the shower line hasn‚Äôt moved by two people since I got here and logged in for a shower. 12 head now 10 in 4 hours?! I take at MOST 40 minutes to shower and shave. The math isn‚Äôt mathing.

For 20h only 15 showers past. This is disrespectful! First shift do something but second sift on April 20. And about the showers I was 3rd in line in 7this morning and now is 10 and I still didn‚Äôt got my shower. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: On August 28th 2025 Shower number 8 was one of the best showers I‚Äôve had at a truck stop in 17.5 years of driving as a truck driver. This town doesn‚Äôt have hard water like most places. It was very ‚Äúsudsy‚Äù while lathering up. The hot water ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and or ford van guys because we are driving all across the country what tou need to do is have a fuel and shower incentive for the sprinter owners and now for the stuff you're not going to like the loves location on Freeport hwy in Baytown ‚Ä¶

I have to say like most loves they are clean, organized and good place to stop at. Like some drivers I would like to walk into a clean shower. The shower I had #4 you can tell it could be clean better. Not mopped/swept or wiped down. The ‚Ä¶
The shower was not even warm. smh. How much it costs, should be hot. Like typical water heater setting at least. Poor truckers can't even get a regular shower here.

People are nice. Laundry was all working and clean truck stop but if you plan on taking a shower here don‚Äôt. Shower head in #2 is broken and the water pressure is almost non existent. The only good thing was that it was hot water. At least ‚Ä¶

Gas nozzle didn't shut off. Sprayed gas all over on me, the truck, and on the ground. "Nothing we can do but check the nozzle, and maybe offer you a shower. Can't give a refund on spilt gas".
Yeah, great! üôÑ ‚Ä¶

Very nice place, clean shower, and restroom but last 3 days I fueled here Def is not working there need to a sign or so,thing to let trucker know so we don't waste our time. Some teenager cashier needs to be train on how to talk to customer ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ per month from multiple stores, than allow some local to use your parking lot as a drop yard. Some of us work and actually NEED a parking spot for REST, A SHOWER, FOOD!!!! I am sure those dropped trailers are raking in the dough for you.

Very friendly service staff and clean... shower stalls were great and the toilet was top notch, üëåü§ìü§é...not sure what the negative reviews are about, the store looked in order and tidy...only negative thing I can say is that the bobtail ‚Ä¶
Good place and clean nice employees. Except for 2 guys Martin and I didn't get the other guys name. Wouldn't mind his business and doubled charged for a team shower

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ parking. Come on $20 a night, and you have no restaurant access, I'm afraid to take a shower, might cost way to much, laundry facilities are a joke, this place might had been a really nice place at one time but that day has come and gone.

‚Ä¶ and what you're getting. Their pancakes are excellent. Shower rooms are on the small side, the floor and the shower itself are sticky, and the whole shower room reeks of old dirty ashtray with fairly piss poor ventilation. At $7 a pop the ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ side which I would rate as a 2 üåü due to poor signage.   Truck side, 12 shower, 20 parking right side, 18 parking left side, lots of spots reserved but not sure which ones.  Cashier wasn't any help had to move my truck out a unmarked spot. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ drivers home and they parked their trucks here. I arrived at 1 pm and I got the last parking space. Did 34 and no other parking the whole time I was here. Not much selection in store. Shower ok but small. Washers looked old but worked great

‚Ä¶ Now my shower review. BEWARE! Came in next day for shower. What a dump. I wonder what wound happen if the health department saw this. Mold in the shower and outside. Hair on the floor. Ventilation doesn't work. Shower door leaked water all ‚Ä¶

Having never been to this truck stop i called and asked "if they had truck parking,"  she answered "yes  they do." So I asked,  "do you have showers" , she answered "yes  we do."  I"said thats awesome !!!" So I drove 18 miles to the truck ‚Ä¶
Nastiest shower I have ever been to. If I could post pictures I would. There wasn‚Äôt even hand soap. So you mean to tell me you have people taking a dump and can‚Äôt even wash their hands? Sick.

My husband is a truck driver and stopped to get shower after fueling up and the cashier was very rude and refused to allow my husband to get a shower.
09/14/2020 8:20pm
Do NOT shower here‚Ä¶$12 and they DO NOT clean the showers after use, they rely on the drivers to clean up after themselves. ü§¢ ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ We spent the night in the RV lot after seeking shelter from dangerous winds & possible severe t-storms. We were able to do laundry & shower,  All very clean.  The laundry was very clean & reasonably priced... would definitely recommend! A ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ has many hidden amenities.  A great place for everyone but especially for truckers, and long haulers, as they have laundry and shower facilities as well as a dentist, barber, work out facilities and so much more! We love stopping on our ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ entertainment. There‚Äôs a huge convenience store for your snack needs and a diner that serves both menu items and a buffet. Didn‚Äôt get a shower there but the restrooms were clean. The place has 3 floors that includes a barber. There‚Äôs also ‚Ä¶

Pretty big with lots to do. Has a shower area. Tons of restaurants. Stuff for kids to explore and see. Has a chiropractor on site. This place has leveled up in the last few years by adding tons of stuff. ‚Ä¶

Hadn't been here in years. Went to take a shower on Palm Sunday and Pastor Daryl was giving a sermon in the lounge in front of the showers. The Lord told me to stay. Was warm & friendly service. Then I met with the pastor for 4 hours that ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of necessities and snacks. Spend some time wandering around the main store area, there's plenty to see. Clean restrooms and shower. Navigate through the various gift shops located throughout the facility. You can also get customized ‚Ä¶

World‚Äôs biggest truck stop. Besides truck parking which can park 900 trucks you have a restaurant, theatre, shower rooms, lounge, convince stores. Its is spread in 75 acres. If I am not wrong you can park here for free. It has fuel station ‚Ä¶

This place is huge. There‚Äôs a food court inside the truck stop. Upstairs there are dentist, chiropractor, shower, laundry, hair salon. And the truck section of stuff takes up half of the place. Parking was no problem. There‚Äôs also tesla ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ You can take a shower, get a haircut, and watch a movie. There's even a dentist and a chiropractor. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and friendly service here you can buy too much trick stuff from here lights bumper fittings hoses etc. little price higher Coustmer service very good here i love this location shower also very clean and too much like more than 25 may be
